snippet: President Obama met with insurance executives to discuss the so-called rate shock if the industry sharply raises premiums this fall.
abstract: Pres Obama meets with insurance industry executives at White House to coordinate upcoming introduction of insurance marketplaces that compose heart of new national health care law; key element of discussion is how to manage so-called rate shock as industry sharply raises its premiums.
lead_paragraph: President Obama met with insurance executives to discuss the so-called rate shock if the industry sharply raises premiums this fall.

headline.seo: Obama and Insurance Executives Discuss Health Care Exchanges
headline.main: Obama Sees Insurers; Health Law Is Subject
headline.print_headline: Obama Sees Insurers; Health Law Is Subject

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
